name: EightBall
0:
”Alexa, open Eight Ball.”
”Alexa, ask Eight Ball for advice.”
”Alexa, ask Eight Ball for an answer.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: eight ball
des: Eight Ball gives mystical advice whenever prompted. When you're not sure what to do, ask Eight Ball.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
